statements: SELECT * FROM WaterSavingInitiatives
SELECT building_name, start_date FROM WaterSavingInitiatives
SELECT * FROM WaterSavingInitiatives WHERE completion_date IS NULL
SELECT building_name, initiative_description FROM WaterSavingInitiatives WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT * FROM WaterSavingInitiatives ORDER BY completion_date DESC, start_date ASC
SELECT building_name, initiative_description, start_date, completion_date FROM WaterSavingInitiatives;
SELECT * FROM WaterSavingInitiatives WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT initiative_id, building_name FROM WaterSavingInitiatives WHERE completion_date IS NULL;
SELECT * FROM WaterSavingInitiatives WHERE building_name LIKE '%Hospital%';
SELECT building_name, initiative_description FROM WaterSavingInitiatives ORDER BY start_date DESC, initiative_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM initiatives;
SELECT id, name, start_date, end_date FROM initiatives;
SELECT name, description FROM initiatives WHERE status = 'Active';
SELECT id, result_description FROM results WHERE result_value > 100;
SELECT id, result_description, result_value, result_date FROM results ORDER BY result_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM initiatives;
SELECT name, status FROM initiatives WHERE status = 'Active';
SELECT * FROM results WHERE result_value > 100 ORDER BY result_date DESC;
SELECT id, name, start_date, end_date FROM initiatives WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT r.id, r.result_description, i.name AS initiative_name FROM results r JOIN initiatives i ON r.initiative_id = i.id WHERE r.result_value >= 500 ORDER BY r.result_value DESC, i.name ASC;
SELECT * FROM water_saving_initiatives;
SELECT initiative_name, start_date, end_date FROM water_saving_initiatives WHERE status = 'approved';
SELECT * FROM buildings WHERE city = 'New York' AND country = 'USA' ORDER BY building_name ASC;
SELECT initiative_name, cost, status FROM water_saving_initiatives WHERE cost > 5000;
SELECT building_name, city, state, zip_code FROM buildings WHERE state = 'California';
SELECT * FROM water_saving_initiatives WHERE initiative_type = 'Energy Efficiency' ORDER BY start_date DESC, cost ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT initiative_name, cost, status FROM water_saving_initiatives WHERE cost > 5000 AND status = 'Completed' ORDER BY cost DESC;

SELECT ws.initiative_name, ws.start_date, ir.water_saved FROM water_saving_initiatives ws INNER JOIN initiative_results ir ON ws.initiative_id = ir.initiative_id WHERE ir.water_saved > 1000 AND ir.result_date >= '2021-01-01';

SELECT ws.initiative_name, b.building_name, b.city, b.country FROM water_saving_initiatives ws INNER JOIN buildings b ON ws.building_id = b.building_id WHERE ws.initiative_type = 'Water Conservation' AND b.country = 'USA';

SELECT ws.initiative_name, ws.cost, ir.cost_saved FROM water_saving_initiatives ws LEFT JOIN initiative_results ir ON ws.initiative_id = ir.initiative_id WHERE ir.cost_saved IS NOT NULL ORDER BY ir.cost_saved DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM initiatives;
SELECT id, name, type FROM initiatives WHERE type='Sustainability';
SELECT name, start_date, end_date FROM initiatives WHERE start_date>'2022-01-01';
SELECT name, address, city, state, zip_code FROM buildings WHERE city='New York';
SELECT id, water_saved, energy_saved, cost_saved FROM results WHERE cost_saved>1000;
SELECT * FROM initiatives WHERE type = 'Environmental';
SELECT name, start_date, end_date FROM initiatives ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT name, city, state, zip_code FROM buildings WHERE state = 'California' ORDER BY name;
SELECT initiatives.name, facilities.name AS facility_name, results.water_saved FROM initiatives JOIN facilities ON initiatives.id = results.initiative_id WHERE results.water_saved > 1000;
SELECT * FROM results WHERE energy_saved > 500 AND cost_saved < 2000 ORDER BY energy_saved DESC, cost_saved ASC;
SELECT * FROM Buildings;
SELECT building_name, address, city FROM Buildings WHERE state='NY';
SELECT initiative_name, start_date, end_date FROM WaterSavingInitiatives;
SELECT result_value, result_date FROM InitiativeResults WHERE initiative_id=1;
SELECT building_id, month_year, energy_usage FROM EnergyConsumption WHERE month_year='2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM Buildings WHERE city='New York'
SELECT building_name, address, state FROM Buildings ORDER BY building_name DESC
SELECT * FROM WaterSavingInitiatives WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30'
SELECT building_name, SUM(energy_usage) AS total_energy_usage FROM Buildings b JOIN EnergyConsumption ec ON b.building_id = ec.building_id GROUP BY building_name ORDER BY total_energy_usage DESC
SELECT b.building_name, w.water_usage FROM Buildings b JOIN WaterUsage w ON b.building_id = w.building_id WHERE w.month_year='2022-08-01'
